narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Maxim Healthcare Services, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Overland Park, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $64.4M in Medicaid payments across 128K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $64.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
